channel.title: Hyperion 459 Client IP change?
channel.description:
Hey guys, I was just wondering if anyone can help me edit my client so that other people can connect.
I just recently started this 459 server, and I have no idea how to edit the client. The client works for my part, but I have no idea how to change the client ip/ports, so that other people can connect.
If anyone could help, it would be greatly appreciated !
Thanks for your time! :) -The Kid

item.title: Hyperion 459 Client IP change?
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

client.java, loader.java, egui.java, gui.java any of these files in the client folder should locate the ip where you can change

Read full topic
